t: Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Motorcycle Saddle Bags
s: I've returned this item only because it did not fit. I have a small commuter BMW 310GS and these bags are just to big. I could see this working on a larger/wider bike though. Overall build quality of the bags is excellent but nothing special - like every saddlebag I've seen.
